citations.narrative:
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 9:58 am on 06/09/2016.
APHIS Veterinary Medical Officer (VMO) knocked on both the veterinarian's and veterinary technician's door with no
answer. The VMO called the AV's telephone number and left a message. The VMO waited 30 minutes at the facility
before departing.

narrative:
2.38(b)                    REPEAT
MISCELLANEOUS.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 9:58 am on 06/09/2016. 
APHIS Veterinary Medical Officer (VMO) knocked on both the veterinarian's and veterinary technician's door with no
answer. The VMO called the AV's telephone number and left a message. The VMO waited 30 minutes at the facility
before departing.
